cause.description:
With half of my Family being from Northern Ireland and my family still being there it is cause close to my heart. This group is for anyone (including non-Northern Irish) who have seen the violence in the country and want the troubles to end and for a new age of peace, stability and prosperity to begin.
1. An end to all violence in Northern Ireland is essential
2. A stable democratic government needs to be set up
3. The troubles must be put behind us
cause.mission: Create awareness of the troubled past and present of Northern Ireland.
cause.name: End the troubles in Northern Ireland
